title: SC14 Supercharger Rebuild
excerpt: Complete teardown and rebuild guide for the Toyota SC14 supercharger found on factory-equipped Previas.

tools.description: You'll need a comprehensive socket set, torque wrench, and a complete SC14 rebuild kit. Having a parts organizer helps keep track of all the small components.

steps.title: Remove the Supercharger
steps.content: Start by disconnecting the battery negative terminal. Remove the intake piping and loosen all mounting bolts. Carefully lift the supercharger away from the engine bay.

steps.title: Disassemble the Unit
steps.content: Carefully separate the front and rear housings. Remove the rotors and inspect for wear. Take photos as you go to remember the orientation of all parts.

steps.title: Install New Components
steps.content: Replace all bearings, seals, and gaskets from the rebuild kit. Apply assembly lube to moving parts. Torque all fasteners to spec (refer to rebuild kit instructions).
